column5: Cool video! its addicting   here's one I made right around xmas...
right on I'm good at fishing not editing you did an awesome job
The last fish took you for a nice run
I've made that trek numerous times... not so safe in the snow lol
Saw this on ur Facebook page and "liked" it lol
Very cool vid! Very nice looking river too!
I have one too and have recorded a few vids.  its my fav toy right now.  its nice to re-live the fight in your living room.  Quality is amazing with the HD model.
Awesome video Denis.  We just grabbed a couple, will be some pretty cool on the water videos coming along very soon.
I got one too and can't wait to start using it.
I need to get one of these. Just waiting on a good price for the HERO2
tons of fun you actually forget that your wearing it most of the time
